title: Action Adventure Stairs and Slope Animation Pack
description: This is a full set of Action Adventure Game Stairs and Slope Animation Pack
longDescription:
Update V2 - 27 June 2024:

  • Added transitions starts stops/ high + low slope angle / pivot animations
  • Animations are made in UE4 and UE5 skeleton.
  • Root motion and in-place.
  • FBX included


Preview - List of Animations


For any updates and requests join our discord channel:

Discord channel

Email - contact@motionbeats.studio


This package contains 156 stairs and slope animations for your project. These quality animations have low and high locomotion traversal , down and up variations snd are both rootmotion and in-place, fully motion-captured and made with the UE4 + UE5 Skeletons.


My other assets in the market : https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Motionbeats+Studio?count=20&sortBy=effectiveDate&sortDir=DESC&start=0


Our studio work: https://www.motionbeats.studio/


Technical Details

Features: Animations (no blueprint)

technicalDetails:
Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes (Animations are created with UE4 + UE5 skeletons )

IK bones are included: Yes

Number of Animations: 156

Animation types : Root Motion and Physics driven

FBX included

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
